source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_00<tab>The Doman delegate is seeking able-bodied adventurers on behalf of Lord Hien.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_00<tab>ラザハンの流星の間にいる、ドマの駐在武官は冒険者にお願いがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_01<tab>At the mere sight of you, the Doman delegate is equal parts excited and relieved. As he tells it, dread beasts heralding the Final Days have begun to manifest in Doma, following the appearance of a blasphemy. Though they have made great strides in slaying the lesser creatures, the greater threat continues to elude them, keeping to the heavens and beyond the reach of their samurai and shinobi. To that end, Lord Hien seeks a marksman able to pluck the beast from the sky. You agree to answer their call for aid, and so he begs you make for the Doman Enclave, where Yugiri will receive you.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_01<tab>ドマの駐在武官から、ドマの偽神獣対策の協力を頼まれた。ドマ町人地の「ユウギリ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_02<tab>Your discussion with Hien and Yugiri is cut short when a vexed villager interrupts with grave news. A young man of Namai recently transformed into a terrible beast, inciting panic in the people as it fled. Hien would take swift action in slaying the creature, and so he and Yugiri leave with the villager for the Glittering Basin, and you are to follow.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_02<tab>ユウギリと話し、ヒエンから偽神獣とドマの状況を聞いた。ナマイ村で人が獣化したと報せがきたので、討伐に向かうことになった。ヤンサの無二江流域にいる「慌てた様子の村人」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_03<tab>There is nothing to be seen when you arrive at the Glittering Basin, and so Hien suggests you split up to cover more ground. He bids you search to the west, reminding you not to hesitate in slaying the beast should you find it first.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_03<tab>慌てた様子の村人と話した。ヤンサのクサカリの里で、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F22B1401 /var>を探して討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_04<tab>You find the beast preparing to sink its fangs into a frightened young boy. Thanks to your timely arrival, and unmatched martial prowess, its meal is denied. All that remains is to ensure the boy is unharmed.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F22B1401 /var>を討伐した。クサカリの里の「怯えた様子の少年」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_05<tab>Much to the surprise of all, the young boy is not thankful, but furious as he accuses you of killing his brother. He runs off in a huff, and shortly after Isse arrives. It would seem that the young boy, Tonbo, pursued the beast born of his sibling when it fled their village, and Isse gave chase to ensure he did not come to harm. He goes on to explain the circumstances that have left the people of his village, and perhaps all of Doma, in the grips of despair. The youth's account gives Hien much to consider as you all return to the Doman Enclave.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_05<tab>怯えた様子の少年を救助した。イッセが現れて、ドマの民が抱える絶望について聞いた。ドマ町人地に戻り「ヒエン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_06<tab>Hien has a mind to visit the villages of Doma personally and inquire after those whom their neighbors believe are more distressed of late─individuals that he fears may be at risk of sharing in the fate of Tonbo's brother. Meanwhile, Yugiri and the other shinobi will continue to hunt the blasphemy that yet eludes them. Until more is known, Hien bids you rest, that you may be ready and able to aid them once more.

※The next role quest will be available from Yugiri upon reaching level 86 in any physical ranged DPS class.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_SEQ_06<tab>ヒエンと話した。彼はドマの民の絶望を把握できていなかったことを反省し、各地を回って民から話を聞くことにしたという。よき頃合いに、またユウギリを訪ねよう。

※いずれかの遠隔物理DPSジョブのレベルが86以上になると、ドマ町人地のユウギリから次の遠隔物理DPSロールクエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Yugiri at the Doman Enclave.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_00<tab>ドマ町人地のユウギリと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the vexed villager at the Glittering Basin.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_01<tab>慌てた様子の村人と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_02<tab>Seek out and defeat the beast.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F22B1401 /var>を探して討伐

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_03<tab>Aid the frightened youth.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_03<tab>怯えた様子の少年を救助

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Hien at the Doman Enclave.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TODO_04<tab>ドマ町人地のヒエンと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_000<tab>Do mine eyes deceive me? <var 08 E905 ((Lady)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Oh, thank the kami.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、
あらためて、あなたにお願いの義がございます。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_001<tab>Lord Hien has requested assistance in the resolution of a most urgent matter─the hunt for a fell beast believed to be a blasphemy.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_001<tab>わが国にも偽神獣と思しき存在が確認されており、
ヒエン様を筆頭に、急ぎその対策に乗り出しました。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_002<tab>Though we have made great strides in ensuring the safety of our people, we fear even our finest shinobi will be no match for this enemy, for it commands the skies of Doma.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_002<tab>しかし、相手は高い飛翔能力を有している模様……。
ドマの侍や忍者は、地上での戦いでこそ本領を発揮しますが、
空を飛ばれては、いささか分が悪いのです。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_003<tab>But as your talent for striking down foes at a distance is beyond compare, I can think of no one better to aid us in overcoming this adversary.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_003<tab>そこで、離れた敵も射貫くことができる、
あなたのような遠隔攻撃の達人に、是非とも協力を頼みたい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_A1_000_001<tab>'Twould be my pleasure.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_A1_000_001<tab>任せてくれ

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_A1_000_002<tab>Well, if no other marksman is up to the task...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_A1_000_002<tab>仕方ないな……

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_004<tab>Oh, kami be praised! I shall inform Lady Yugiri, that she may receive you at the Doman Enclave. Safe travels, <var 08 E905 ((Lady)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_004<tab>引き受けてくださるとは、ありがたき幸せ！
では、ドマ町人地に向かい、「ユウギリ」殿にお声がけください。
何卒よろしくお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_010<tab>Lady Yugiri will await your arrival at the Doman Enclave. Safe travels, and may the kami speed your way.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_010<tab>ドマの偽神獣対策に協力してくださるのならば、
ドマ町人地に向かい、「ユウギリ」殿にお声がけください。
何卒よろしくお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_020<tab>It is good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. When we received word that you of all people had answered our call, I could scarcely believe it. Yet here you are.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_020<tab>これは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
ラザハンに送った武官から、貴殿に対して協力要請を行ったと、
そう報告を受けていたが……

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_021<tab>Lord Hien will be pleased for this reunion. If you would wait here a moment...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_021<tab>そうか、協力してくださると！？
それは助かる、急ぎヒエン様をお連れするゆえ、
しばしお待ちを……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_022<tab>Well, well, that the kami should guide your steps to our door once more, and with such fortuitous timing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_022<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
力を貸してくれるとはありがたい！
まっこと、そなたがいれば頼もしいかぎりだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_023<tab>Pray forgive me for not affording you a hero's welcome, but time is not on our side.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_023<tab>さっそくだが、ドマに現れた偽神獣と、
こちらの状況について共有させてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_024<tab>Not long after receiving word of men transforming into hideous beasts in Thavnair, a similar creature was born of a woman in Isari. After attacking another villager, it took to the skies and fled, though to where we know not.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_024<tab>サベネア島の終末現象が報告されたすぐ後のこと。
イサリ村でひとりの女が突如として異形の魔物に転じ、
人を襲って飛び去ったという事件があった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_025<tab>An all too cruel twist of fate, for the one slain was among the prisoners returned to us in that deplorable exchange with Asahi and the Empire. Just when they had at last begun to piece their life back together...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_025<tab>痛ましいことに、このとき犠牲になったのは、
かつてガレマール帝国との捕虜交換で帰国してきた者だった。
ようやく幸せを掴んだところで……むごい話よな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_026<tab>This blasphemy must be stopped. Alas, our foe is wont to keep to the skies, well beyond the reach of our samurai and shinobi.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_026<tab>ともかく我らは件の魔物を偽神獣と認定し、対策に乗り出した。
ただし相手は、高い飛翔能力を有しておってな……
目撃されることはあれど、仕留めきれん。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_027<tab>Thus did we seek the aid of those proficient in ranged combat, able to pluck the beast from the heavens.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_027<tab>そこで、そなたのような遠距離攻撃に長けた達人を、
探し求めておったというわけよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_028<tab>Of course, martial prowess alone will not solve our problems─others have turned into weaker but no less gruesome abominations, as was the case in Thavnair, and their numbers increase by the day.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_028<tab>だが、この問題は武力だけでは解決できん。
サベネア島における事例と同じく、我がドマにおいても、
偽神獣の出現以来、獣に転じる者が出始めておるのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_029<tab>From what I understand, this phenomenon is not unlike a sickness which spreads by feeding on fear and anxiety. Emotions which, of late, can be found in abundance. Slaying the beasts means nothing if the peoples' hearts cannot be put at ease.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_029<tab>聞けば、獣化は絶望によって引き起こされるという。
民がいかなる絶望を抱えておるのかを理解し、
その対策を講じる必要もあろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_000_030<tab>(-???-)Lord Hien!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_000_030<tab>(-？？？？-)ヒ、ヒエン様！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_100_030<tab>You have to help! The villagers─they...they...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_100_030<tab>た、た、大変なことが……！！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_031<tab>Sir, please─calm yourself, and tell us what happened.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_031<tab>落ち着け……！
いったいどうしたというのだ？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_000_032<tab>Another has been turned in Namai, my lord! For a blessing, no one was harmed when the beast flew into a rage, but...the people are in a panic! I fear what may happen next.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_000_032<tab>ナマイ村で、人が獣になっちまったんでさぁ。
ひと暴れして村を出ていきましたが、まだ辺りに……
みんな怯えてるんで、なんとかしてくだせぇ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_033<tab>It would seem we have even less time than I thought.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_033<tab>ええい、我らが手をこまねいておるうちに、
またも獣化する者が現れようとは……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_034<tab>Worry not. We will see to the beast.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_034<tab>あいわかった……。
その獣、我らが討とう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_100_034<tab>As of yet, there is no cure for this affliction...but we will save what lives we can. I promise you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_100_034<tab>無念ではあるが、獣に堕ちた者は元には戻せん。
人を襲う前に討ってやるのが、せめてもの情け……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_035<tab>I trust you are ready to join the fray?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_035<tab>来て早々となるが、そなたにも協力してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_000_036<tab>It was last seen near the Glittering Basin. Come, I will show you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_000_036<tab>あっしが獣のところまで、案内しやす。
無二江流域まで、ついて来てくだせぇ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_040<tab>Without a cure, we've no choice but to cut them down before they can cause more harm.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_040<tab>できることならば斬りたくはないが……
放置すれば、さらなる悲劇が起こるのは必定ゆえ、な。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_041<tab>Still no sign of the beast. Or any other, for that matter...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_041<tab>ここへ来るまでには、獣らしき姿は見つからなかった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_000_050<tab>The beast was right here, I swear it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_UNSETTLEDVILLAGER_000_050<tab>獣はさっきまで、この辺りをうろついてましたので、
まだ、そう遠くへは……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_051<tab>I thank you for leading us here, but it is not safe. Please, return to your village.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_051<tab>そうか、案内に感謝する。
そなたの身も危険ゆえ、早く村に戻ってくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_052<tab>We should split up if we're to have any chance of finding it. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would you see to the west? I will search in the north. Yugiri, I leave the east to you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_052<tab>ここは、手分けして捜索した方がよさそうだ。
わしは北を回るゆえ、ユウギリは東を、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は西の方を頼む。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_053<tab>If you find it, remember─these blasphemies are no longer people. They will not hesitate to strike you down, so you mustn't either.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_053<tab>獣を見つけたら、迷わず討伐してくれ。
かつての人を討つこと、そう簡単に割り切れるものではないが……
獣に転じた者とて、同胞を手に掛けたくはないはず。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_054<tab>Now, let us not waste any more time.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_054<tab>各々、抜かりなくゆこう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_060<tab>Are you all right? We heard shouting and came as fast as we could.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_060<tab>争う物音が聞こえてな。
ユウギリと合流し駆けつけたのだが……

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_061<tab>It would appear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> arrived not a moment too soon.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_061<tab>そちらの童は、不運にも獣に出くわしてしまったのか……
ともかく貴殿がおらねば、危なかったはず。
かたじけない、恩に着る。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TONBO_000_062<tab>(-Frightened Youth-)Why...
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TONBO_000_062<tab>(-怯えた様子の少年-)よくも……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TONBO_000_063<tab>(-Frightened Youth-)Why did you kill my brother!?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TONBO_000_063<tab>(-怯えた様子の少年-)よくも、兄貴を殺したな……！！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_100_064<tab>Your brother...?
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_100_064<tab>まさか、おぬし……

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_064<tab>Young man, that creature was not your kin. Not anymore. Had <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> not laid it to rest, it would have killed you, and countless others.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_064<tab>少年……獣化したのは、そなたの兄であったか……。
獣に転化した者を討つように、<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>に依頼したのは、
誰あろう、このわしだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_200_064<tab>But if your heart cries out for one to blame, let it be me. The beast was slain at my behest, for it was the only way...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_200_064<tab>討伐せねば、おぬしや村の者らが危うかった、
と理屈を言ったとて、納得できるものではなかろう……。
恨むなら、わしを恨んでくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TONBO_000_065<tab>(-Frightened Youth-)No! No, you're wrong! You killed him! Murdered him! I hate you!
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_TONBO_000_065<tab>(-怯えた様子の少年-)お前なんか大っ嫌いだ！！

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_066<tab>Isse? What are you doing here?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_066<tab>イッセではないか。
ナマイ村の出であるお主なら、獣のことは知っているはず。
このような場所で、何をしている？

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_067<tab>Searching for Tonbo, though clearly you found him first. The monster was his older brother, as you may have guessed, and Tonbo gave chase the moment it ran off.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_067<tab>あいつ、トンボっていうんだ。
獣になった兄を追って、村を飛び出したもんで、
心配になって探していたんだよ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_068<tab>I beg you forgive him for his outburst.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_068<tab>ヒエン様、あいつの無礼を許してやってください。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_069<tab>His brother was all he had left. Their father was conscripted by the Empire and was, regrettably, not among those returned to us in the recent exchange of prisoners.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_069<tab>トンボたち兄弟の父親は帝国に徴兵されていて、
このあいだの捕虜交換でも戻ってこなかったんです。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_070<tab>The hope they might one day be reunited was their only comfort when that...when the viceroy still ruled. I can only imagine how they felt when she walked into Isari, a shadow of her former self.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_070<tab>それだけでも辛いはずなのに……
記憶を失ったヨツユが、村に現れたことがありましたよね。
動揺した兄弟たちは、あの日を境にますます暗くなってしまって。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_071<tab>"Tsuyu“ may have had no memories of the monster she was, but her victims still see her in their dreams. Nevertheless, like many, the brothers prayed your mercy would see their family restored...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_071<tab>憎むべき絶対の悪がいて、誰かがそれを倒してくれる。
そんな単純な話だったなら、トンボたち兄弟だって、
過去に区切りをつけられたのかもしれません。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_072<tab>But then they learned of her death, and of their father's absence. Deprived of hope and of hate all at once, they had...nothing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_072<tab>でも、現実は……。
ふたりは、最終的にヨツユが死んだと聞かされてなお、
どこに感情を向けていいのか迷って、苦しんでいる様子でした。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_074<tab>Ah! M-My apologies for rambling.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_ISSE_000_074<tab>す、すみません。
俺、つい出過ぎたことを……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_075<tab>No. No, it was a rather enlightening tale.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_075<tab>いや、包み隠さず話してくれて、助かった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_100_075<tab>I spared the woman who brought him pain, and took the brother who brought him comfort.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_100_075<tab>獣となったトンボの兄を討つよう依頼したのもわしならば、
生きて戻ったヨツユを、斬らぬと判断したのもわしだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_076<tab>Aye...I would hate me too.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_076<tab>トンボなる少年、彼には、わしを恨む権利がある。
無礼などと思うものか。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_077<tab>I swear I will set things right for Tonbo. For all the people of Doma. Please, return home, Isse, and be safe.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_077<tab>それに、おかげで獣化について見えてきたことがある。
この件はわしらが必ず解決すると約束しよう。
そなたは心配せずに村に戻ってくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_078<tab>Let us return to the Doman Enclave. This ordeal has given me much to consider.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_078<tab>ひとまず、我らもドマ町人地に戻ろう。
道すがら少し考えさせてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_080<tab>I do not envy Lord Hien the burden now thrust upon him. But he shall not have to bear it alone.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_080<tab>誰よりも民を思っておられるヒエン様が、
民を斬らねばならず、また憎悪を向けられるとは……。
何ともやるせない話だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_085<tab>I owe you a great debt for your timely assistance.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_085<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
あらためて、此度の協力に感謝させてもらおう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_086<tab>And an apology, for I've made you an executioner in young Tonbo's eyes. Would that I had been the one he witnessed cut down the beast his brother had become.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_086<tab>そして、ひとつ詫びもさせてくれ。
偶然とはいえ、遺族の前で獣と化した者を討たせるなどと、
損な役回りをさせてしまい、すまなかった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_090<tab>But we haven't time to dwell on regrets and what should have been. No, we need to take action, and after hearing of Tonbo and his brother, I believe I know what must be done.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_090<tab>が、奇しくも此度のことで、獣化に至る絶望に迫れたと思う。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_091<tab>A great many of our brothers and sisters were returned to us in the prisoner exchange. But even so, there are those who yet remain lost to us.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_091<tab>先の捕虜交換では、多数の徴用兵が戻ってきたが、
当然、すべての者が生きて帰れたわけではない。
大切な者と再会できなかった者も、少なくなかったのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_092<tab>Meanwhile, Yotsuyu, who was directly responsible for much of our people's suffering, was never held to account for her crimes. In death, she claimed vengeance for her suffering at the hands of her brother, but it came at the expense of justice for her countless victims.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_092<tab>それでいて恨みをはらせたかというと……
ヨツユは処刑されることなく、己の罪を認めることもなく、
まるで「本懐を遂げた」かのように死んだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_093<tab>The people of Doma have every right to resent me for failing them and their grief. But what of those who cannot bring themselves to do even that─who are left alone with their anger and their pain?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_093<tab>悪を悪として討たなかったのだと、わしを恨めた者は良い。
しかしながら誰も恨めず、家族と再会できた者を、
羨むこともできなかったとしたら……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_094<tab>It may well give way to despair, and then...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_094<tab>誰にも救われず、恨みを晴らすこともできないと感じ、
心を絶望に染め上げ……獣に転化した、と。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_095<tab>They would share the same fate as Tonbo's brother, yes.
target: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_095<tab>少なくとも、トンボの兄の事例はそうであろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_096<tab>Which is why we must needs consider who else might share in his anguish, ere we find ourselves beset by more beasts.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_096<tab>さらなる獣化を防ぐには、彼ら兄弟のように、
絶望を抱えながらも、見逃されてきた者たちを探さねばならん。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_097<tab>I will begin making rounds of the villages to inquire after those whom their neighbors believe are more distressed of late.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_097<tab>ゆえに、わしはドマ各地の集落を巡り、
ひとりでも多くの民の声を聞いてこようと思う。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_098<tab>Very good. I and the other shinobi shall continue our search for the blasphemy which set these events in motion.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_YUGIRI_000_098<tab>承知……。
では、私は忍びたちと共に偽神獣の捜索を続けます。

source: TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_099<tab>And you, my friend─we will have need of your talents again ere long. Rest assured we will keep you apprised of our findings.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBA401_04120_HIEN_000_099<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
そなたも、折を見て再訪してくれると助かる。
状況に進展があり次第、共有させてもらうゆえな……。
